definition: Lianshan district of Huludao city 葫蘆島市|葫芦岛市, Liaoning
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The mostly of molybdenum mine are concentrated at the Gangtun town of Lianshan District in Holudao city.
sentences.chinese: 而鉬礦主要集中在葫蘆島市連山區鋼屯鎮。
